SELECT distinct h.order_id v, h.order_id k FROM (Select g.order_id,od0010.article_id from (select distinct od0000.order_id,od0000.create_ymd,od0000.create_hms,od0000.store_cd from od0000,od0000_t
and od0000.order_id = od0000_t.order_id /*关联收货表*/ and od0000.order_differentiate = #{orderDifferentiate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and od0000.order_type = '01' /*进货*/
and od0000.review_status = 20 /*收货状态*/
and od0000.store_cd in
#{store,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ( lower(od0000.order_id) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) )
order by od0000.create_ymd desc,od0000.create_hms desc)AS g left join od0000 on od0000.org_order_id=g.order_id and od0000.order_type = '02' and od0000.order_sts = '00' left join od0010 on od0010.order_id=g.order_id and od0010.receive_total_qty <> 0
AND OD0010.receive_total_qty is not null )AS h WHERE h.article_id is not null and h.order_id not in ( SELECT org_order_id from od0000 where order_differentiate = #{orderDifferentiate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and org_order_id is not null and order_id like 'RR%')

select order_id, od0000.store_cd, od0000.vendor_id, CONCAT(ma1000.store_name,' ',ma1000.store_name_en) store_name, ma2000.vendor_name, od0000.vendor_id dc_id, (select warehouse_name from ma5321 where warehouse_no = od0000.vendor_id) dc_name, (select count(*) from od0000 t where t.org_order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.order_type = '02' and t.order_sts = '00' and t.review_status in(1,5,6,10)) audit_num/*统计正在审核的退货单*/ from od0000 left join ma1000 on od0000.store_cd = ma1000.store_cd and #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN ma1000.effective_start_date AND ma1000.effective_end_date left join ma2000 on od0000.vendor_id = ma2000.vendor_id and #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN ma2000.effective_start_date AND ma2000.effective_end_date where od0000.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct ma1100.article_id k, CONCAT(ma1100.article_id,' ',ma1100.article_name) AS v from ma1100 ,sk0000_today WHERE 1=1 AND sk0000_today.article_id = MA1100.article_id
AND sk0000_today.store_cd=#{dto.storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR }
AND #{dto.orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN ma1100.effective_start_date AND MA1100.effective_end_date AND ma1100.aging_stock_returnable='1'
AND ( lower(ma1100.article_id) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{dto.v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) OR lower(ma1100.article_name) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{dto.v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) )

SELECT A.article_id,B.spec,B.article_name,B.unit_id,B.spec,B.unit_name,
(SELECT distinct MA1110.default_barcode FROM MA1110 WHERE MA1110.article_id=#{dto.articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
MA1110.vendor_id = A.major_vendor_id AND (#{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} between MA1110.effective_start_date and MA1110.effective_end_date) ) AS barcode from (SELECT sk0000_today.on_hand_qty, sk0000_today.on_order_qty, sk0000_today.article_id, sk0000_today.major_vendor_id FROM sk0000_today WHERE sk0000_today.article_id = #{dto.articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sk0000_today.store_cd=#{dto.storeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MA1100.article_id, ma1100.article_name, ma1100.sales_unit_id AS unit_id, MA0220.unit_name, ma1100.spec FROM MA1100,MA0220 WHERE MA1100.article_id =#{dto.articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MA0220.unit_id=ma1100.sales_unit_id
)AS B ON B.article_id=A.article_id

select distinct e.emp_name as create_by, f.emp_name as modified_by, concat(A.create_ymd,A.create_hms) as create_date, A.order_date, A.order_id, A.org_order_id, A.delivery_center_id delivery_center_id, C.warehouse_name as delivery_center_name, A.store_cd, A.return_type, D.store_name, concat(A.update_ymd,A.update_hms) as update_date, A.order_remark from od0000 A left join ma5321 C on C.warehouse_no = A.delivery_center_id left join ma1000 D on D.store_cd = A.store_cd and A.order_date BETWEEN D.effective_start_date AND D.effective_end_date left join ma4200 e on A.create_user_id=e.emp_num_id left join ma4200 f on f.emp_num_id=A.update_user_id
and A.order_id = #{orderId}

select distinct a.barcode, a.article_id, b.article_name, b.spec, d.unit_id, d.unit_name, a.vendor_id, coalesce(a.order_qty,0) order_qty, coalesce(a.order_nocharge_qty,0) order_nocharge_qty, a.order_price, a.order_amt order_amount, a.reason_id, a.is_free_item, a.is_free_item as is_free_item_text, (select code_name from cm9010 where code_type='00400' and code_value = a.reason_id)as reason_name,
coalesce(a.order_qty,0) AS receive_qty, coalesce(a.order_nocharge_qty,0) AS receive_nocharge_qty
coalesce(a.receive_qty,0) AS receive_qty, coalesce(a.receive_nocharge_qty,0) AS receive_nocharge_qty
from od0000,od0010 a,ma1100 b left join ma0220 d on d.unit_id = b.sales_unit_id and d.effective_sts = '10'
od0000.order_id = a.order_id and b.article_id = a.article_id and od0000.order_date BETWEEN b.effective_start_date AND b.effective_end_date
and od0000.order_id = #{orderId}

select ma2000.vendor_id, ma2180.this_return, ma2180.this_remain_return, ma2180.this_exchange_return from ma2000,ma2180
ma2000.vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{businessDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN ma2000.effective_start_date AND ma2000.effective_end_date and ma2000.vendor_id = ma2180.vendor_id and ma2000.effective_start_date = ma2180.effective_start_date and ma2000.trading_term_no = ma2180.trading_term_no
select warehouse_no k,CONCAT(warehouse_no,' ',warehouse_name) v from ma5321
